member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Forms.Frontend.GetContent
member.summary: Override this method and return the HTML output for the module.
member.returns: Must return the markup that renders the module.

code.description: How to inherit ContentModule and override GetContent

member.remarks: The markup returned is what is inserted into the template tag ParagraphModule in the paragraph template.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Autocomplete
member.summary: Specifies whether an input field should have autocomplete on or off.
member.remarks: Compatible field types: text, search, url, tel, email, password, date pickers, range, and color.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Autofocus
member.summary: Specifies that the input field should automatically get focus when the page loads.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Min
member.summary: Specifies the minimum value for an input field.
member.remarks: Compatible field types: number, range, date, datetime-local, month, time and week.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Max
member.summary: Specifies the maximum value for an input field.
member.remarks: Compatible field types: number, range, date, datetime-local, month, time and week.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Pattern
member.remarks: Compatible field types: text, search, url, tel, email, and password.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Required
member.summary: Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form.
member.remarks: Compatible field types: text, search, url, tel, email, password, date pickers, number, checkbox, radio, and file.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Step
member.summary: Specifies the legal number intervals for an input field.
member.remarks: Compatible field types: number, range, date, datetime-local, month, time and week.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies that the input field is disabled.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.ReadOnly
member.summary: Specifies that an input field is read-only.
member.remarks: Compatible field types: text area, text, password, search, email, tel, url, date, datetime-local, month, time and week.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.MaxLength
member.summary: Specifies the maximum allowed length for the input field.
member.remarks: Compatible field types: text area, text, password, search, email, tel, url.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Cols
member.summary: Specifies the visible width of a text area.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Forms.Rules.ConditionType.Rows
member.summary: Specifies the visible number of lines in the text area.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Forms.Submit.SubmitToken
member.summary: Gets the submit token used for displaying the receipt. It is an encrypted and base64 version of the submit id. A submit can be displayed by accessing a page with the forms module by adding s={SubmitToken} to the query string.
